itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Thinning Fancy Feathers. It requires knowledge of Thinning.

item.name: Flamingo Plume
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted flamingo corpse.

item.name: Fancy Feather
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Thinning Flamingo Feathers.

item.name: [Wizard] Calpheon Noble Suit
item.desc:
A suit for Calpheon aristocrats. It's both fabulous and practical.
- Item effect: Amity +15% from a conversation
※ If you use a costume exchange coupon, you'll get the same suit with an additional effect of moving speed +2. The costume can be equipped in the same slot as the pearl costume.
If you exchange it for a costume, you cannot register it to the Marketplace.

item.name: [Berserker] Calpheon Noble Suit
item.desc:
A suit worn by Calpheon aristocrats. It's both fabulous and practical.

- Item Effect: Amity +15% from a conversation

※ If you use a costume exchange coupon, you will get the same suit with an additional effect of Movement Speed +2. The costume can be equipped in the same slot as a pearl costume.

If you exchange it for a costume, you cannot register it to the Item Marketplace.

item.name: [Warrior] Calpheon Noble Suit
item.desc:
A suit worn by Calpheon aristocrats. It's both fabulous and practical.

- Item Effect: Amity +15% from a conversation

※ If you use a costume exchange coupon, you will get the same suit with an additional effect of Movement Speed +2. The costume can be equipped in the same slot as a pearl costume.

If you exchange it for a costume, you cannot register it to the Item Marketplace.

item.name: Supreme Fancy Feather
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Shaking Fine Fancy Feather and Leather Glaze, an ingredient made through Alchemy. It requires the knowledge of Shaking: Skilled.

※ Shaking: Skilled can be obtained as a challenge reward after achieving Processing Artisan Level 1.
